website_summaries.verdict: A solid all around iPhone that's not incredibly new, but can still handle current software.
pros: New features make lots of improvements from the previous editions
Home button is much more convenient, and hardware more reliable
cons: Apple removes its headphone jack, so you'll have to invest in a pair of Bluetooth headphones or use an adapter

customer_reviews.title: SCAM!!
customer_reviews.text: Phone is locked. I just wanted the phone. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My iPhone was locked to Straight Talk and had a financed balance!
customer_reviews.author: Kahlos Mahn

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: The phone came with T-Mobile chip and blocked by its carrier. Behind a hard time convincing them to renove some stupid code. May have to return it. Very frustrated!
customer_reviews.author: Delores Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my in law. It was carrier locked to simple mobile but that’s what I was looking for anyways since we activated it with them. It came in it’s original Apple packaging with the shrink wrap and the SIM card attached to it. It works fine no problems
customer_reviews.author: cass

customer_reviews.title: Not a good option
customer_reviews.text: No SIM card was included. Finally got a SIM from carrier and the phone has to be power cycled numerous times to even make a call. Should have just went to carrier for the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Malone

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product is not compatible with my telephone carrier. Very inconvenient..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Loved it brand new phone fast shipping same day delivery
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, I love the phone and it works very well. 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Frank Faison II

customer_reviews.title: Phone wasn't unlocked to Simple Mobile.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this with the intention of using it right away. I have other devices that run Simple Mobile and as soon as I put in this SIM card it wouldn't register. I had to call Simple Mobile and they verified my line was perfectly fine, I could not get the SIM card to function properly. Stay away from this listing. As you can see, the reviews aren't very good for a reason. I certainly learned my lesson. Will be returning for a refund. Very unhappy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: ***LOCKED PHONE!! BEWARE!**** (SCAM)
customer_reviews.text: This is a locked phone to simple mobile which is a pre-paid carrier. They will not unlock it unless you use their service. A headache and waste of time. The fact that these details are in the fine print and not up front seems malicious. VERY UNHAPPY.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P.

customer_reviews.title: If you know what you are doing, it's a perfect phone.
customer_reviews.text: Before buying this phone, I read all the reviews and was skeptical about the phone. Ordered it and it came with the SIM card and everything was fine with the phone, turned on and worked. Everyone complaining saying it's locked and didn't know it would be locked, should learn how to read the details. AWESOME phone, just what I was looking for. Everything came in perfect condition. Comes in original box with phone, earbuds, and charger. Would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Ruano

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: This cell phone does not work, it has tfw and it cannot be unlocked, it is not good, a great scam.

customer_reviews.title: Simple Mobiles cellular network is bad
customer_reviews.text: It takes minutes to stream a song and somethimes I can’t stream a video at all even after buying extra GB of data. The phone is ok but the service provider is horrible.

customer_reviews.title: Love apple products.
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded my iPhone se with the iPhone seven just amazed at performance and aces ability. Love the phone and don’t need to upgrade for a while!!

customer_reviews.title: If it is 100 $ cheaper than its price then it’s great. Apple warranty is only up to 10th Feb

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. Matte black iPhone 7 32GB in perfect condition. Packaging a little strange as the phone did not come with any accessories or SIM card but this was expected. Phone works great!

customer_reviews.title: simple mobile locked

Its response speed is very slow. It may be because its configuration does not run the IOS14 version.,The system alone uses 9 GB of memory

customer_reviews.title: Simple mobile is the worst provider
customer_reviews.text: The iPhone itself is awesome simple mobile is the worst provider I’ve ever experienceIf I’m not connected to my own Wi-Fi at home their Internet service is absolutely useless I even bought $10 worth of extra gigsWe’re a total waste of money I’ve text people and peoples text me that never showed up on either end Just my personal experience After spending $200

product_meta.title: Simple Mobile Prepaid - Apple iPhone 7 (32GB) - Black [Locked to Carrier – Simple Mobile]
feature_bullets: CARRIER - This phone is locked to Simple Mobile from Tracfone, which means this device can only be used on the Simple Mobile wireless network.

PLANS - Simple Mobile offers a variety of coverage plans, including 30-Day Unlimited Talk, Text & Data. No activation fees, no credit checks, and no hassles on a nationwide lightning-fast network. For more information or plan options, please visit the Simple Mobile website.
ACTIVATION - You’ll receive a Simple Mobile SIM kit with this iPhone. Follow the instructions to get service activated with the Simple Mobile plan of your choice.
IP67 water and dust resistant (maximum depth of 1 meter up to 30 minutes)
7MP FaceTime HD Camera with Retina flash
Touch ID for secure authentication and Apple Pay
iOS 12 with Screen Time, Group FaceTime, and even faster performance
